preqs: SCI3501, SCI3502 and completion of two internships (one international).  Students must complete 144 point.

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SCI3501, SCI3502} AND  Must have passed 144 (I/W) credit points)
Must be enrolled in course version {3550, S3001}

description: Working in collaboration with innovative industry partners and the Faculty of Science, students will complete an independent research project. Through this process, students will be connected to industry partners to gain an understanding of the challenge that has been set, the nature of the industry and stakeholder needs. This is the preparatory unit to develop student's theoretical understanding of the industry challenge in preparation for the development of the project plan and commencement of the group based project in SCI4502.
